meta.title: Validation Contract
meta.summary: Define explicit checks for populated/styled output, 5 distinct section types, responsive behavior, and lifecycle validation steps.

result.summary: Defined concrete validation contract for the new landing dashboard and executed lint/typecheck gates successfully.

task.objective: Define and execute the final validation contract proving the updated Next.js landing page is populated, styled, and type-safe.
constraints: Use repository lifecycle commands for task execution and closeout.
Validate only against implemented route behavior and current style contract.
Avoid introducing non-deterministic checks that depend on external services.

steps.instruction: Verify the landing route replaces default Next.js starter UI with DM internal dashboard content and chart/card/table sections.
steps.artifact: Confirmed route content structure covering KPI cards, chart area, placeholder cards, and activity table.

steps.instruction: Run lint and typecheck as release gates for the updated landing route.
steps.artifact: Passing command output for lint and typecheck.

expected_output: Landing page compiles and passes lint/typecheck without errors.
Route contains at least five distinct section types: header, KPI card grid, trend chart panel, placeholder card row, and activity table.
Task metadata includes lifecycle validation evidence and completion summary.
stop_conditions: Stop and ask operator when validation failures are unrelated to landing page changes or when lifecycle scope gates fail due unrelated dirty files.
